Class InvalidGeodeticParameterException

Object
Throwable
Exception
FactoryException
InvalidGeodeticParameterException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class InvalidGeodeticParameterException extends FactoryException
Thrown when a factory create­Foo(…) method is given invalid parameters. This exception may be thrown by factories that create an object from geodetic parameters like semi-major or semi-minor axis length, latitude of natural origin, etc. The cause may be a parameter having an illegal value, or a mandatory parameter which has not been specified.

This exception is not for invalid authority codes. For such cases, see No­Such­Authority­Code­Exception instead.

Since:
0.7
